arts.ttl: Coventry City boss makes centre-forward claim after BTA's 'skill set aligned'
arts.sum: He has set a standard, but we have some good strikers and they have got to keep upping their game. Mark Robins insists Brandon Thomas-Asante has “set the standard” for himself and his fellow Coventry City front men after a man of the match display against Blackburn Rovers.

arts.ttl: Coventry City boss reveals extent of Tatsu Sakamoto's shocking injury
arts.sum: Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group. You could see the stud marks around it, so they have sliced his thigh open.”

arts.ttl: John Eustace's honest verdict on Blackburn Rovers' 'bad night' at Coventry
arts.sum: The Blackburn Rovers head coach gave an honest view after their 3-0 defeat at Coventry City

arts.ttl: Mark Robins hails 'much-needed' Coventry City victory and sets his players immediate challenge
arts.sum: Mark Robins says that his Coventry City players have set the “benchmark” for themselves after a hugely encouraging and much-needed bounce back performance against Blackburn Rovers. Much-needed, yeah, for confidence, belief, for the supporters but we played some really good football and we have not really got what we have deserved this season, apart from Saturday when we deserved nothing (at Leeds).
Coventry ended Blackburn's unbeaten start to the Sky Bet Championship season with a 3-0 win at the CBS Arena.

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers surrender unbeaten start after poor Coventry City display
arts.sum: Blackburn Rovers were well beaten as they lost their unbeaten start to the Championship season

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers player ratings: Plenty off-colour in Coventry City defeat
arts.sum: Marks out of ten as Blackburn Rovers were beaten 3-0 at Coventry City

arts.ttl: Coventry City player ratings as Sky Blues bounce back with a belter against third top Blackburn Rovers - Andy Turner
arts.sum: Wright then doubled the lead early in the second half when a poor backpass from Dolan was chased down by Brandon Thomas-Asante, forcing Dom Hyam into an error and the USA striker to intercept. But the home side found the back of the net a minute later when Bidwell got his head to a Jack Rudoni free-kick and flicked the ball over the keeper to give the Sky Blues the early lead.

arts.ttl: Coventry end Blackburn’s unbeaten start with comprehensive victory
arts.sum: Jake Bidwell opened the scoring with his first goal since April.

arts.ttl: Coventry City v Blackburn Rovers live build-up, team news and updates from the CBS Arena
arts.sum: Get the latest Coventry City news sent straight to your phone by joining our Sky Blues WhatsApp group. Stay tuned for all tonight's team news which will be published here at 6.45pm, an hour before kick-off, before Sky Blues reporter Andy Turner provides live updates throughout the evening.
